
### gaps between segments  {.smaller}

<pre><code>LOAD off    0x0000000000000000 ...
     filesz 0x00000000000036a8 ...
LOAD off    0x000000000000<em>4000</em> ...
     filesz 0x0000000000013581 ...
</code></pre>
 

* first LOAD loads <code>0x0-0x36a8</code>
* second LOAD loads <code>0x4000-0x17358</code> 

   * starts at <em>multiple of <code>0x1000</code></em> b/c that's what OS can handle

* <code>0x4000-0x36a8</code> bytes of file not used 

   * (and loaded on Linux, because Linux rounds up filesz)
